name: Fishing Hurts
description:
Here is a small game we made for the Weekly Game Jam (93). We've made it in four days. The theme was fishing, so we decided to make a game to show raise awareness of increasing pollution of the oceans and the unnecessary animal genocide.

Team:

Nielisson | Graphics and sound design (all sounds are from Freesound.org)
Piotr 'D3vmotiv' Czech | Programming | https://d3vmotiv.itch.io/
